response.overview: Step into the unsettling world of 'Drug Call,' a suspenseful short film following Shivam and friends on a night of celebration turned horror. As the clock strikes 3:00 PM, their housewarming takes a chilling turn, plunging them into a maze of hallucinations and inexplicable events. Shadows dance, lights flicker, and a dark past intertwines with their reality, leaving them grappling with a nightmarish blend of drug-induced visions and eerie truths. Brace yourself for a spine-tingling tale where reality blurs, leaving you captivated by the mysterious and the terrifyingly unknown.
response.title: Drug Call
